para.verbatim: Prepare to install new firmware on an attached XBee module.

detaileddescription.para: The host must be able to control the reset pin of the XBee module.

parameterdescription.para: XBee device to install firmware on. Must have been set up with xbee_dev_init().

The current version of this library can only update the local XBee module, so this parameter should always be NULL. When over-the-air (OTA) updating is supported, this paramter will be the address of a remote module to update.
Structure with function pointers for seeking and reading from the new firmware image.
success
NULL parameter passed to function
XBee device passed to function doesn't have a callback for controlling the reset pin on the XBee module.

briefdescription.para: Drive the firmware update process for boards that use .EBL files to store their firmware.

parameterdescription.para: object used to track state of transfer
update is in progress
update completed successfully
source is invalid
general failure
connection timed out waiting for data from target

briefdescription.para: Returns a unique value indicating the state of the .EBL install process.

parameterdescription.para: object used to track state of transfer

simplesect.para: unique value that changes whenever the transfer state changes

para.verbatim: Update \a buffer with the current install status of \a source.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this string will only change if the return value of xbee_fw_install_ebl_state() has changed.

parameterdescription.para: State variable to generate status string for.
Buffer (at least 80 bytes) to receive dynamic status string.

simplesect.para: Returns parameter 2 or a pointer to a fixed status string.

briefdescription.para: Drive the firmware update process for the HCS08 application on Programmable XBee modules.

parameterdescription.para: object used to track state of transfer
update is in progress
update completed successfully
source is invalid
general failure
connection timed out waiting for data from target

briefdescription.para: Install the firmware image stored in source.

detaileddescription.para: You must call xbee_fw_install_init() on the source before calling this tick function.
If successful, XBee will be running the new firmware at 115,200 baud.

parameterdescription.para: Firmware source initialized with seek and read functions.
Successfully installed new firmware.
Firmware installation in progress (incomplete).
firmware does not contain a valid firmware image.
Firmware checksum failed, image is bad.
Couldn't establish communications with XBee module.
Firmware is not compatible with this hardware.

briefdescription.para: Update buffer with the current install status of source.

parameterdescription.para: State variable to generate status string for.
Buffer (at least 80 bytes) to receive dynamic status string.

simplesect.para: Returns parameter 2 or a pointer to a fixed status string.

briefdescription.para: Helper function for setting up an xbee_fw_buffer_t for use with a source firmware image held entirely in a buffer.

parameterdescription.para: structure to configure for reading firmware from a buffer
number of bytes in firmware image
address of buffer containing firmware
success
invalid parameter

briefdescription.para: Driver layer for performing XBee firmware updates.

xrefdescription.para: Create typedefs for xbee_fw_source_t read() and seek() handlers, write documentation including what the return values are. We will have to check existing functions to confirm the API, but I'm guessing <0 for error, >=0 for number of bytes read. Make sure calls to the read() function check for errors! _xbee_oem_verify() does not!
